errors.noYtVidLinksFound: No YouTube video links were found in the message.
errors.noVidInfoFound: No video information could be found.
errors.guildCfgInaccessible: No server configuration found - please run `/config reset`
errors.messageInaccessible: The targeted message could not be accessed.
errors.onlyRunInGuild: This command can only be run in a server.

general.commandOnlyUsableInServers: This command can only be used in a server

descriptions.command: View or edit the bot configuration for your server

subcmd.reset: Reset the configuration to the default settings
subcmd.list: List all configurable settings and their current values
subcmd.set: Set a specific setting to a new value

settings.defaultVideoInfoType: The default video_info type, used when a link is sent or no type argument is given
settings.numberFormat: The number format for this server, used for example when displaying likes and dislikes
settings.locale: The language and country setting for the server, used for translations, number formatting and more
settings.autoReplyEnabled: Whether the bot will automatically reply to all messages containing a video link

set.error: Couldn't set the ${settingName} due to an error: ${err}
set.localeInvalidHint: Only the listed languages are supported.

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the configuration?
reset.success: Configuration successfully reset to default settings.

descriptions.command: List all commands or get information about the bot

args.show_hidden: Show commands that need higher permissions, as long as you can use them - reply is only shown to you

info.name: info
info.headline: Version ${version} - created by [${name}.](${url})
info.donationLink: This bot is completely free so if you are able to, please consider [supporting the development ❤️](${url})
info.bugsLink: - Submit bugs or feature requests [on GitHub](${url})
info.supportServerLink: - [Join the support server](${supportServerInviteUrl}) if you have any questions or need help
info.globalOptOut: - Opt out of automatic replies across every server by using the command `/settings set auto_reply new_value:false`
info.installExtensions: Install these browser extensions to improve your experience with YouTube:
info.installExtReturnYtDislike: - [ReturnYoutubeDislike](https://returnyoutubedislike.com/) - shows approximate likes and dislikes on videos
info.installExtSponsorBlock: - [SponsorBlock](https://sponsor.ajay.app/) - shows segments and chapters to automatically or manually skip
info.installExtDeArrow: - [DeArrow](https://dearrow.ajay.app/) - shows crowdsourced thumbnails and titles to reduce clickbait
info.installExtMobile: On Firefox Beta for Android, you can install these extensions by [creating your own extension collection.](https://www.androidpolice.com/install-add-on-extension-mozilla-firefox-android/)
info.poweredBy: This bot wouldn't have been possible without the APIs of [ReturnYoutubeDislike](https://returnyoutubedislike.com/), [SponsorBlock](https://sponsor.ajay.app/), and [DeArrow.](https://dearrow.ajay.app/)

embedFooters.commands: You can also right click or tap and hold on a message and use commands under "Apps"

invite.description: Invite YTInfoBot to your own server
invite.embedContent: You can invite YTInfoBot to your server by [clicking this link.](${inviteUrl})

descriptions.command: Get information about the bot's privacy or delete your data.

subcmd.info: Get information about the bot's privacy.
subcmd.delete_data: Delete all data the bot stored about you.

info.line1: **YTInfoBot stores the following data about you and your server:**
info.line2: - When you invite it to your server, it stores the server's ID and the server configuration data (locale, number format, etc.).
info.line3: After you kick it from your server, it also deletes all server data.
info.line4: - When editing your user settings, it stores your user ID and the settings you've changed.
info.line5: You can delete your user data by using the `/privacy delete` command.

delete.confirmLine1: **Are you sure you want to delete all data associated with your account?**
delete.confirmLine2: If you run certain commands, your user ID and default settings will be stored again.
delete.confirmLine3: You can also block the bot to prevent it from reading your messages again.
delete.confirmLine4: No data will be saved when the bot automatically replies to you, only when you run a command manually.
delete.noConfirmation: No confirmation received, cancelling deletion of data.

descriptions.command: Show information about a video, given its URL

options.video: URL to the video or video ID - supports music.youtube.com, youtube.com and youtu.be URLs
options.type: Type of information to show - defaults to reduced

errors.foundNoVidInfo: Found no data for this video - please try again later
